name: QuikPiq
tag_list: image, poll, twitter, facebook, mobile, iphone
description: Create image based polls on the go!
overview:
Quikpiq is a web and mobile application that lets you ask your social network for help in making decisions by creating image based polls from wherever you are.

Quikpiq is fully integrated with popular social networks, Twitter and Facebook. Designed for the person who loves to share and is always on the go, Quikpiq allows you to get a second opinion on a decision, in a fun way. Using your phone or computer, upload images to create polls which are shared with your social network. Your friends can vote and leave comments, and you get results in real time. Quikpiq satisfies the desire for people who love to share their statuses, photos and decisions through Twitter and Facebook. With Quikpiq, people can start sharing their photos and engaging their social network in their everyday decisions.
